info.title: Mithra Direct App
info.description: API documentation for the subscription services

patch.description: Updates the delivery address for a specific user. Only valid keys (address1, address2, city, state, zipCode, country) are accepted.

requestBody.description: A map containing valid delivery address fields. Valid keys: address1, address2, city, state, zipCode, country.

400.description: Invalid input keys or validation error

WithAddressAndWithoutVendor.summary: Response with address and without vendor

WithOutAddressAndWithVendor.summary: Response without address and with vendor

Invalid mobile number and should be 10 digits.
value.user_message: Please check the request and try again!!

get.summary: Fetch vendors with a given status
